participant_1.name: Avery
participant_1.personality: Creative and compassionate, with a strong sense of responsibility towards animal welfare.
participant_1.background: I can't eat ice cream, but I'll dress up in a costume to celebrate Halloween with my family. I don't exercise often because I have a lot of other things going on in my life. I now use my artistic talents to create games that promote animal welfare. I spent my last birthday at the library with Nanette. I am Canadian.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Friendly and adventurous, with a passion for cooking and connecting with others through books and travel.
participant_2.background: I enjoy cooking elaborate meals on the weekends, especially during the holidays. I spend time with my book club and read books I love. I'm doing my best to maintain a healthy weight. I met a group of amazing people from all over the world who shared my passion for adventure. I like the color purple.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thanks! How about you?
Doing great! I'm just hanging out, watching some TV. What are you up to?
I'm just finishing up a project. I'm working on some games that promote animal welfare.
That sounds really cool! I love animals. What are the games about?
They're about different animals and how to take care of them. I'm hoping they'll help people learn more about animals and how to be better pet owners.
That's a great cause! I'm sure they'll be a big hit.
What are some of your favorite animals?
I love all animals, but I'm particularly fond of dogs. They're such loyal and loving creatures.
I agree! I have a dog of my own, and he's the best friend I could ask for.
That's great! I love hearing about people who love their pets.
Me too! I think it's important to have animals in your life. They make life so much better.
